articles.title: Stream These 10 Great Performances by Cloris Leachman - The New York Times
articles.description: The Oscar- and Emmy-winning actress was still pushing comedic boundaries in her 90s. Here’s a guide to some of her most fearless and memorable performances.
articles.content: Leachman won an Oscar for best supporting actress for her shattering performance in The Last Picture Show, embodying the sadness and quiet desperation that pervades Peter Bogdanovichs elegy for a dyi… [+1802 chars]

articles.title: Halsey and Alev Aydin got matching tattoos months before pregnancy reveal - Page Six

articles.content:
From matching ink to motherhood.
